channel.title: New server need help (now a portforwarding problem)
channel.description: basically im trying to make a server i cant get it online so i need a hoster and they will be co owner umm yeah so if your interested plz reply i have tried everything i think its my dumb router i will put up pics of the server. All the other stuff is resolved but i cant portforward my D-Link DIR-600

yeap your released client needs to contain your no-ip DUC ip. example 127.0.0.1 in my client. cuz im host an for released client im gonna put… Swiftzscape.no-ip.biz

item.title: New server need help (now a portforwarding problem)
item.dc:creator: @str8golden str8golden
item.description:
@str8golden wrote:

try turning off your firewall first nuff said thier. use portforward.com if you need to learn to portforward… it works everytime ^^ if it dont turn off ya firewall an you should be able to… also remember your clients ip has to be 127.0.0.1 for you to connect because your local host ;D

Read full topic
